h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Spider Celestial Staff Location
content: The Spider Celestial Staff can be found in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow upon defeating the Violet Spider in Gathering Cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Spider_Celestial_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Spider Celestial Staff', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Spider Celestial Staff Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Spider Celestial Staff can be found in Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow upon defeating the Violet Spider in Gathering Cave.
